dbProcs

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbProcs.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to create database connections using the FileInputProperties.readfile method to gather property information Initiated by Getter.java, Setter.java

    • Method Detail

      • closeConnection

        public static void closeConnection(java.sql.Connection conn)
        This method is used by the application to close an open connection to a database server
        Parameters:
        conn - The connection to close

      • getChallengeConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getChallengeConnection(java.lang.String ApplicationRoot,
                                         java.lang.String path)
        This method is used by the application to get a connection to the secure database sever based on the input path to a specific properties file.
        Parameters:
        ApplicationRoot - The running context of the application.
        path - The path to the properties file to use for this connection. this is filtered for path traversal attacks
        Returns:
        A connection to the secure database server

      • getCoreConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getCoreConnection(java.lang.String ApplicationRoot)
        Returns connection to core schema in database
        Parameters:
        ApplicationRoot -
        Returns:
        Connection to core schema with admin privileges

      • getDatabaseConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getDatabaseConnection(java.lang.String ApplicationRoot)
        This method is used by the application to get a connection to the secure database sever
        Parameters:
        ApplicationRoot - The running context of the application.
        Returns:
        A connection to the secure database server

      • getSqlInjLessonConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getSqlInjLessonConnection(java.lang.String ApplicationRoot)
        This method is used by the application to get a connection to the secure database sever's SQL injection Lesson schema
        Parameters:
        ApplicationRoot - The running context of the application.
        Returns:
        A connection to the secure database server
